NOTES: 
Right this is a mixture of the german video source (same as the russian aswell) mixed with some
direct audio i was given by KB (Mad props m8ty).
To start with the german video is really good in parts but then in others it's crap 
It goes into a slow motion effect and when it does all the colouring/contrast etc....all changes.
The audio i was given was nice and clear but lacked a bit of life.....sounds direct but not the best direct i've heard.
Still better than the other cam audios i've heard for this release 


WORK DONE: 
Loads 
First problem was the audio....runtime was over 5mins longer than the video.
Did notice the german video was missing 1min 36 secs off the begining so i decided to crop the audio.Could have used another
source for the begining but it was a cellphone video source and sorry...it was too bad and not worth adding.
So this left me with still 3mins extra audio......so i had to shrink the audio twice in total to get this bloody thing to sync good 
Once i had my new audio file i loaded this and the video into xpress and then it was a case of syncing the whole audio......and in total it
took 17 cuts.....started off good just needing an odd cut every 20-30 mins then just before the 1hr mark into it,it was going out every few mins 
until the last 10 mins or so.
To sum it up ......it was a complete *$^!!* to do 
Once done it was onto the video.....now the good parts are pretty good but the bad parts are bad,and there was nothing i could do about it.
Like i stateted in my notes,the video seemed to randomly change to slow motion and change all the colouring/contrast/brightness... the lot.
I fixed the good parts of the video the best i could the nad parts i could do anything really.......On a whole though the original video had way too 
much blue and had loads of bright spots throughout the film......
I needed to change all the following chroma,gamma,lum,contrast all increased.....the rgb black base was lowered alot and also used a contour filter to 
sharpen the video up.The rgb colours all needed to be changed aswell.

Overall 7/7/7 for the good parts......4/7/7 for the bad parts.
If you can wait then it might be worth waiting,but i know there's a lot that can't so ...happy downloading
